name: Iron chariots
body:
### Welcome.
The Iron Chariots Wiki provides information on apologetics and counter-apologetics by collecting common arguments and providing responses. A goal of the site is to help counter misinformation and poor arguments which masquerade as evidence for religious claims.


### Supported Systems.
This application is currently designed for mobile and tablet specific experience for accessing the Iron Chariots Wiki found at [http://wiki.ironchariots.org](http://wiki.ironchariots.org). Currently supported systems are [webOS](https://developer.palm.com/appredirect/?packageid=com.icottrell.ironchariots), [Android (ICS tablet only)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.icottrell.ironchariots&feature=search_result#?t=W251bGwsMSwyLDEsImNvbS5pY290dHJlbGwuaXJvbmNoYXJpb3RzIl0.), [Windows Phone 7](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-CA/apps/6765c449-fd1a-42ff-b1b0-3a2f1ff4903b) and [BlackBerry Playbook](http://appworld.blackberry.com/webstore/content/86780/?lang=en). 


### License
This project is a private endeavour and not officially supported by IronChariots.org

### Authors and Contributors
@rylan
tagline: Access the Iron Chariots wiki through mobile devices
